Class PremiumMember

java.lang.Object
GymMember
PremiumMember
public class PremiumMember extends GymMember
Class of a Premium Member of the gym. Extends the abstract class GymMember and contains additional attributes and methods.
Author:
Sadikshya Karki

      phone - Phone number of the gym member

      DOB - Date of birth of the gym member
      membershipStartDate - Membership start date of the gym member
